name: Vanilla Marshmallows
description:
We admittedly go heavy on the real vanilla extract. These are rich and tasty! Hopefully the best marshmallow that you will ever eat.

no:
artificial anything
high fructose corn syrup
gluten
eggs
nuts
dairy
About one dozen fluffy, delicious, handmade marshmallows. Net weight 11 oz. (310 grams) per bag.
Shipping is determined by amount and location & added at checkout in paypal.  Around $6 for 2 bags east of the Mississippi and around $10 for west coast.
Shipping is the same for:
1-2 bags     3-5 bags    6-8 bags    9-12 bags
Yes, we ship international!

name: Espresso Marshmallows
description:
With real shots of espresso, these are rich and nutty while sweet and fluffy all at the same time.
These are caffeinated so be warned if you feed them to your kids.. (less than a shot of espresso per bag).

name: Wasabi Marshmallows!
description:
Wasabi also known as Japanese horseradish is here.  Ok, these are not as hot as your sushi dip but they taste like the real deal.  We use a natural wasabi flavor, so like all of our marshmallows these have no artificial anything.
